p: We differentiated between the egg survival (e) and hatching (h) rates of N 0 (e 0 and h 0, respectively) and N 1 (e 1 and h 1, respectively). For N 2, daily fecundity (f) was averaged per breeding pair since the fairy shrimps only reproduce sexually. Therefore, N 0 for any given inundation was the sum of the total fecundity on each day, considering that only a proportion of adults (a) survived to the next day.
